text: Porfirije (, ; born Prvoslav PeriÄ‡; born 22 July 1961) is the head of the Serbian Orthodox Church. He was the Metropolitan bishop of Zagreb and Ljubljana of the Serbian Orthodox Church, from 2014 to 2021. Before that, he was titular bishop of Jegar between 1999 and 2014. On 19 February 2021, he became the 46th Patriarch of the Serbian Orthodox Church. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Patriarchs of the Serbian Orthodox Church
title: Porfirije, Serbian Patriarch
